column5: Nothing serious here but news of some board members has not been good. BUT, this weekend should be better as I have a few visitors of the OFC variety arriving tonight for the weekend and a couple more for supper tomorrow night. It should be an excellent time. I'm pumped about that. Hope they have a great stay here and that our supper tomorrow night is filled with laughs and stories.  That's all I wanted to say.
Well I am jealous as those OFC'rs are in for a treat. Roy and J's hospitality is second to none!
Thank you John. You know that you and Barbara are welcome here anytime.  edited to add: And any of your friends for that matter.
See ya in about 6 1/2 hrs
Tell Paul to hoist a beer for me Roy.. shouldn't be too hard! lol
Not too sure Paul even drinks anymore.....got 4-5 cases of root beer here for him though.
I'll leave a light on, John.
Hope you all have a good weekend we have a nice group of OFNCers heading down my way in a few hours also lets hope the musky goddess is on our side tomorrow.
did i hear someone say rootbeer
Don't worry.. that rootbeer will still all be there come Monday!
rootbeer doesnt go skunky does it
that all depends on what root you are talking about... way to easy to pick on old Roy and others here so I'm going to stop there before his root grow's roots...
Only when you leave out the vodka
Chin up Roy, have a great evening.
Roy, perhaps you should try steelheading  If you have any Gibsons, have a few for me tonight, lol.
Hey it's 5:40 and they're not here yet......maybe they had a good afternoon?
Have a good time there kids!! Lets see some pics of your little mini getogether and hopefully some pics of stinky, slimy, toothy muskies!!
Good to hear Roy.. now if I get over there for Work some time I will let you know...As long as all goes well here my friend...
Hope all y'all had an awesome weekend...
Mmmmmm...Paella and root beer...sounds like a great combo to me...  Have fun guys !!!
